channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Export Users With Meta
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Export Users With Meta

item.title: CVE-2021-24451|2024-08-03T19:28:23.930Z -- unknown -- export%20users%20with%20meta
item.description: The Export Users With Meta WordPress plugin before 0.6.5 did not escape the list of roles to export before using them in a SQL statement in the export functionality, available to admins, leading to an authenticated SQL Injection.
